rows.label: qst202829_msg0001
rows.name: Appraise it, mo?

rows.label: qst202829_msg0002
rows.name: Shall I appraise it?

rows.label: qst202829_msg0003
rows.name: Yes

rows.label: qst202829_msg0004
rows.name: No

rows.label: qst202829_msg0005
rows.name: Is that so, mo?

rows.label: qst202829_msg0006
rows.name:
If you want it appraised,
come back anytime, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0007
rows.name: Then let's get right to appraising, mo!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0008
rows.name: Let's see...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202829_msg0009
rows.name: Mo mo! This is Himahistone, mo!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0010
rows.name: It's an ore discovered by Mogumogu, mo!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0011
rows.name:
This Himahi is apparently the name
of Mogumogu's girlfriend, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0012
rows.name:
I pray he doesn't break up with
her later and regret it, mo...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202829_msg0013
rows.name:
This is the representative jewel
of Gula, Greenmarine, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0014
rows.name:
It's a wonderful jewel that
reveals a leaf pattern when
soaked in water, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0015
rows.name:
It's very popular with the ladies
and is traded at a high price, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0016
rows.name: Th-This is Lightocyte, mo?!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0017
rows.name:
It's so rare now that it's
called the phantom stone. It's
amazing you found one, mo!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0018
rows.name:
It's said to be more beautiful than
any other jewel, and you can see a
path of light inside it, mo!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0019
rows.name: You should hold on to it, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0020
rows.name: Mo mo~ This is Trollenite, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0021
rows.name:
Everything excavated is
shaped like a giant, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0022
rows.name:
It's not exactly beautiful, but it's
a charming and good stone, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0023
rows.name: I see. This is Stormstone, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0024
rows.name:
It's a mysterious stone that
regularly creates a wind
like a small tornado, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0025
rows.name:
The hot spring lovers of Superbia
supposedly enjoy it by sinking it in
their baths to create a jacuzzi, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0026
rows.name: Ho ho! This is a Crystal Dome, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0027
rows.name:
It's delicate and easily broken,
so it's an ore that requires the
utmost care when excavating, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0028
rows.name:
It's filled with water and lots of fine
jewels, and when you shake it, it looks
like snow falling and is very beautiful, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0029
rows.name:
A fine item to sell or to
use as a decoration, mo!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0030
rows.name: This is Verdi Crystal, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0031
rows.name:
Because of its beautiful green
color, it's also known as the
Forest of Jewels, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0032
rows.name:
It's often stolen by Pippito, so be
careful with its management, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0033
rows.name: Mo mo~ This is a Lightning Pearl, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0034
rows.name:
It's called the Tear of the Divine Beast
because it's born when lightning strikes
a jellyfish-type Divine Beast, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0035
rows.name:
You can't touch it for a few days after
it's born because it's still electric,
so just because you found one,

rows.label: qst202829_msg0036
rows.name: don't go touching it recklessly, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0037
rows.name:
Hmm hmm... This scent...[ML:Dash ]
It's Yawn Lazuli, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0038
rows.name:
It's a rather unusual jewel
that smells of the sun, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0039
rows.name:
In Iyasaki Village, it's often given
to babies to calm them down, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0040
rows.name: This is Darkcyte, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0041
rows.name:
It's a rare jewel that glows softly
and beautifully in the dark, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0042
rows.name:
Darkcyte is a popular jewel
as a charm against evil, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0043
rows.name: W-what! This is Absorp Quartz, mo?!

rows.label: qst202829_msg0044
rows.name:
Mysteriously, this jewel
absorbs light, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0045
rows.name:
It's difficult to find, so it can
be traded at a high price, but

rows.label: qst202829_msg0046
rows.name:
it's said to be unlucky, so only a
few enthusiasts will buy it, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0047
rows.name: This is Gong Crystal, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0048
rows.name:
This crystal occasionally makes
a sound, so it's easy to find
if you don't miss it, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0049
rows.name:
It feels a bit romantic to think of
it as trapping sound inside, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0050
rows.name: Ho ho. This is a Dusky Pearl, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0051
rows.name:
It's an ore that changes color
depending on the environment, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0052
rows.name:
This one is black, so it must
be from Temperantia, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0053
rows.name:
Unfortunately, it wasn't a new species
this time, mo. If you find another ore
you want appraised, bring it, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0054
rows.name:
Every ore has value, mo. Please
treat it with care, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0055
rows.name: Hmm...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202829_msg0056
rows.name:
As expected, a new species
of ore is hard to find, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0057
rows.name:
At this rate, the only option is to
go search in uncharted lands, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0058
rows.name:
You won't find a new ore by
searching in the same places
as everyone else, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0059
rows.name:
For example, in the land
of a Divine Beast that no
one has ever been to...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202829_msg0060
rows.name:
there's a high probability
of finding a new ore, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0061
rows.name:
If you ever go to a new land,
you should try excavating, mo.

rows.label: qst202829_msg0062
rows.name:
If you find an ore you've
never seen before, I'll
appraise it for you, mo.
